rules.description: CAPS_LOCK -> tap==ESC and hold==COOL (all right mods)
Right Option Key -> COOL Key (all right mods)
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
escape -> tap==ESC and hold==COOL (all right mods)
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
CAPS_LOCK -> tap==ESC and hold==COOL (all right mods)
ESC -> tap==ESC and hold==COOL (all right mods)
Right Option Key -> COOL Key (all right mods)
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Close Window by pressing cmd+shift+q instead of cmd+shift+w, default behavior with caps_lock
